title: Waiver of inspection
context: ยง514A-35 Waiver of inspection. The commission may waive an inspection when in its opinion, a preliminary, contingent final, final, or supplementary public report can be substantially drafted and issued from the contents of the questionnaire and other or subsequent inquiries. [L 1977, c 98, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985; am L 1991, c 44, ยง6; am L 1997, c 135, ยง6]
